bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of a mental derangement with irregular crying and laughing, as well as insulting and cursing both persons close to oneself and strangers. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 13: 心病其色 赤，心痛短氣，手掌煩熱，或啼笑罵詈，悲思愁慮 , “In the case of a heart disease, the complexion is red. The heart aches and [the patient] is short of qi. The palms are affected by vexing heat. In some cases [patients] cry , laugh , insult , and curse . They may be sad, or thinking, or worrying, or pondering”.
